entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
